issue.title: [CI] [C++] Use boost binaries on Windows GHA build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7726](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7726). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the Github Actions "AMD64 Windows 2019 C++" build, around 10 minutes are spent compiling the bundled Boost library from source. We should probably find a way to reuse some existing binaries.
